channel.title: Comments on: Searching for the Tianjin Antique Market
channel.description: A miscellany of know-it-all-isms by Geoff Sowrey

item.title: By: wernerhickeySteve
item.dc:creator: wernerhickeySteve
item.description: Greetings, you have to go on certain days for the market to be fully up and running. Thursday mornings and Sunday mornings aret the best. This is when the market is in full swing.
item.content:encoded: Greetings, you have to go on certain days for the market to be fully up and running. Thursday mornings and Sunday mornings aret the best. This is when the market is in full swing.
